WorkItem.Description:
I use dropdowns and styling on a range of cells (eg: A3:A100). 
The export of this excel file is successful. 
After editing the file with records and saving it, the dropdown formulas and styling on the rest of the cells is lost. (eg: if my last record was in cell A50 , then i lose the styling and dropdown formula for the rest of the cells in the range).
I am saving the file as excel 07.
